subject: Next.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I have a frikkin' obsession with this junk! I want to try mixing the white
noise with the tuner audio, being able to disable the funcion via a panel
switch. That is, given enough time! I always get these crackhead ETs, or
what claims to be them giving these pick up dates. May 7th is another one of
these.

 This the tuner from a Timex T309T Clock Radio. Even in this, at one second
"girl-it's done...", and don't think for a nono second that I don't still
feel embarrased at posting voices that call me a girl, even after all these
years.


 F-S

I ha e a ikkin' obsession wi h his junk! I wan o y mixing he whi e noise wi h he une audio, being able o disable he uncion ia a panel swi ch. Tha is, gi en enough ime! I always ge hese c ackhead ETs, o wha claims o be hem gi ing hese pick up da es. May 7 h is ano he one o hese. 

 
 This he une om a Timex T309T Clock Radio. E en in his, a one second "gi l-i 's done...", and don' hink o a nono second ha I don' s ill eel emba ased a pos ing oices ha call me a gi l, e en a e all hese yea s. 

 
 
 F-S
